name: $proposed
desc: The request is in preliminary form prior to being sent.

name: $requested
desc: The request is 'actionable', but not all actions that are implied by it have occurred yet.

name: $active
desc: Actions implied by the request have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".

name: $on-hold
desc: All actions that are implied by the order have occurred and no continuation is planned (this will rarely be made explicit).

name: $completed
desc: The request has been withdrawn and is no longer actionable.

name: $cancelled
desc: The request was entered in error and voided.
